channel.title: Hengda Shi's Tech Blog :)
channel.description: Recent content on Hengda Shi's Tech Blog :)

item.title: About Me
item.description: Welcome! My name is Hengda Shi. I am currently a data scientist on the search team at ZipRecruiter. I graduated from University of California, Los Angeles in March 2021 with master and June 2019 with bachelor degree both in Compute Science (centennial class!!). My interests lie in the field of machine learning, ranging from object detection, to graph neural networks, eventually to large language models. I’m also interested in hardware acceleration techniques of machine learning algorithms.
